author: smuzaffar
body: This fixes the lost dictionary definition errors we see in IBs and PR tests. New dictionaries were added via https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/45199/files but mapping was missing for these new dict in Utilities/ReleaseScripts/scripts/duplicateReflexLibrarySearch.py
title: Fix lostDict: Add HcalRecHitSoA for HcalRecHit package
